name: CQ.dam.Util
doc: The CQ.dam.Util library contains utilities for a DAM Asset Share Page.

methods.name: alertNoSelection
methods.doc: <static> Displays a message that no assets are selected in the lens.

methods.name: downloadAsset
methods.doc:
<static> Downloads the assets in the selection under the given path. If path is
not defined...

methods.name: openAsset
methods.doc: <static> Opens a single asset in the Asset Editor.

methods.name: openAssets
methods.doc: <static> Opens a single or mutliple assets in the Asset Editor.

methods.name: reopenAssets
methods.doc: Reopens the assets that have been opened earlier using openAssets.

methods.name: setAssetEditorPath
methods.doc:
<static> Sets the path of the Asset Editor Page. openAsset will open
the asset there.
